caption: A high-energy dance-pop track with four-on-the-floor beats, catchy synth riffs, and energetic female vocals. Features a massive drop, vocal chops, and an infectious hook designed for radio play and club rotation.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Friday night the week is done
Time to have a little fun
Call my girls we're heading out
This is what it's all about

[Pre-Chorus]
Feel the bass drop in my chest
Tonight we're gonna be the best

[Chorus]
Dance until the sun comes up
Never gonna get enough
Hands up if you feel alive
This is how we survive
Dance dance dance

[Verse 2]
Strobe lights flashing everywhere
Music pumping through the air
Nothing matters anymore
We own this dance floor

[Pre-Chorus]
Feel the bass drop in my chest
Tonight we're gonna be the best

[Chorus]
Dance until the sun comes up
Never gonna get enough
Hands up if you feel alive
This is how we survive
Dance dance dance

[Drop]

[Bridge]
Let it go let it flow
Let the rhythm steal the show

[Outro Chorus]
Dance until the sun comes up
Dance dance dance
